name: Addition
desc: Properties shared by all addition types.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of addition. For example, LinkAddition.

items.name: rangeLength
items.desc: The number of text characters that will be highlighted as the link.

items.name: rangeStart
items.desc: The starting character index for which the addition is meant. A range starts at 0 for the first character.If rangeStart is specified, rangeLength is required.
